com.jde.view.sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.sprites.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This Sprite class contains there location of a sprite in a certain spritesheet
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int displayListId
      OpenGL display list id of the sprite
      protected double h
      Sprite height in the sheet
      protected boolean loaded
      It is true when a displayListId has been generated
      protected double scaling
      Scale factor, applied when drawing
      protected SpriteSheet sheet
      Spritesheet that contains this sprite
      protected double w
      Sprite width in the sheet
      protected double x
      Top left X-axis coordinate of the sprite in the sheet
      protected double y
      Top left Y-axis coordinate of the sprite in the sheet

    • Constructor Summary

      Basic constructor

        Basic constructor
        Parameters:
        sheet - Spritesheet that contains this sprite

        w - Sprite width in the sheet
